Audio.Locality: Pousada Caiman, Forest patch, Matto Grosso do Sul state
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Song of an unseen individual (about 4-5m up) in understory of semi-deciduous woodland with Guadua bamboo understory. Based on voice, I originally thought this might be an H. minor type, but new experience with the same vocalization in La Paz make me think it is probably a vocalization of H. margaritaceiventer. Any comments on this would be welcome!bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
